definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to enroll new students/to get students
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
NCEE, National College Entrance Examination (college entrance exam in PRC)/usually abbr. to 高考[gao1 kao3]

definition: to enter oneself for an examination
vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])
